article: There is an old saying. It tells us we must go to bed  _  and get up early in the  _  .Then we will be  _  .We will also be rich and  _  .That is right .The body must have enough sleep to be healthy .Children of young age should have  _  hours sleep every night. The body also  _  exercise .Walking ,running ,jumping and playing games are all exercise .Exercise keeps the body strong . Exercise also helps the blood to move around inside the body.
